Name: Perun
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with The Leviathan Axe.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

While a friendly SLAVIC formation is within 6" of this model then that formation has the FLY tag and a Durability Characteristic of 6+. In addition, whenever a ranged attack targets this formation, subtract 1 from the hit roll.
After this formation completes a normal move or dash roll 5D6 for each enemy formation within 6" of this model. On a result of 4+ the formation being rolled for suffers 1 ethereal damage.

Spells.Name: Thunderous Smiting (35)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy Formation within 18" of this model and roll 3D6. For each result of 4+ the formation being rolled for suffers D6 ethereal damage and all other formations (friend or foe) within 6" of the selected formation suffer D3 ethereal damage.
